job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pTitle uEngineering Internship Machine Learning EngineeruppJob Description ppNoria Water Technologies seeks an intern with experience working in a laboratory environment and basic knowledge of image analysis and machine learning interested in gaining realworld experience We are a water technology company providing unique solutions for improving operations of waterbased processes through realtime monitoring big data and analytic capabilities The candidate must be able to thrive in a dynamic multidisciplinary and handson environment that values excellence creativity and innovationppTermspp uFall 2021 from August to Decemberupp Parttime during the school year must be able to work 1520 hoursweekpp Flexible schedule can be arranged for parttime work during normal business hoursppResponsibilitiespp Inperson laboratory workpp Support of development projectspp Characterization of images of fouled scaled materialspp Set up and run reverseosmosis experimentspp Setup image collection system collect data and apply image processing and machine learning techniquespp Assists with designs experiments and assemblies as requestedppBenefitspp Practical experience with a wide variety of water treatment and desalination and data science taskspp Collaborating handinhand with interdisciplinary teampp Shadowing mentoring and training opportunities with seasoned professionalspp Flexible schedule for studentspp Noria facilities are spacious with strict adherence to COVID19 protection requirementsppQualifications ppRequired to be currently enrolled in a fulltime Bachelors degree or Graduate degree STEM program at an accredited college or universitypp Must work onsite and be fully vaccinatedpp Laboratory experience requiredpp Knowledge of basic data science and ability to use machine learning tools for image analysispp Excellent analytical and mathematics skillspp Good verbal and written communications skills with ability to work in a team environmentpp Experience programming in Python  C  C with AWS or drawing CAD is a plus ppJob Function ppEngineering Physical Sciences Research Science and Mathematics ppnbspppnbspppnbspppLocation
